00034 #ifndef HARPS_COMPORNENT_FM
00035 #define HARPS_COMPORNENT_FM
00036 
00037 #include <harps/clock.hpp>
00038 #include <harps/buffer.hpp>
00039 #include <harps/note.hpp>
00040 
00041 #include <harps/compornent/sine.hpp>
00042 #include <harps/compornent/envelope.hpp>
00043 #include <harps/compornent/envelope2.hpp>
00044 #include <harps/compornent/add.hpp>
00045 #include <harps/compornent/mul.hpp>
00046 #include <harps/compornent/volume.hpp>
00047 
00048 namespace harps {
00049   namespace compornent {
00053     template <
00054     typename ModuleType0, typename ModuleType1,
00055     unsigned int _clock_select = 0,
00056     int _delay = 0, int _attack = 0, int _hold = 0, int _decay = 0, int _sustain = 0, int _release = 0
00057     >
00058     class FM {
00059       public:
00060         typedef
00061         Mul <
00062         Sine <
00063         Add< ModuleType0, ModuleType1 >
00064         > ,
00065         Envelope< _clock_select, _delay, _attack, _hold, _decay, _sustain, _release >
00066         > OperatorType;
00067         template< typename SampleType >
00068         void operator() ( Buffer< SampleType > &_buffer, CurrentTime &_clock, Note &_note ) {
00069           source_module ( _buffer, _clock, _note );
00070         }
00071       private:
00072         OperatorType source_module;
00073     };
00074 
00075     template <
00076     typename ModuleType0, typename ModuleType1
00077     >
00082     class FM< ModuleType0, ModuleType1, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0 > {
00083       public:
00084         typedef
00085         Sine <
00086         Add< ModuleType0, ModuleType1 >
00087         > OperatorType;
00088         template< typename SampleType >
00089         void operator() ( Buffer< SampleType > &_buffer, CurrentTime &_clock, Note &_note ) {
00090           source_module ( _buffer, _clock, _note );
00091         }
00092       private:
00093         OperatorType source_module;
00094     };
00095 
00100     template <
00101     typename ModuleType0, typename ModuleType1,
00102     unsigned int _clock_select,
00103     int _delay,
00104     int _attack, int _attack_middle, int _attack_middle_level,
00105     int _hold, int _hold_level,
00106     int _decay1, int _decay1_middle, int _decay1_middle_level,
00107     int _decay1_end_level,
00108     int _decay2, int _decay2_middle, int _decay2_middle_level,
00109     int _sustain_level,
00110     int _release, int _release_middle, int _release_middle_level
00111     >
00112     class FM2 {
00113       public:
00114         typedef
00115         Volume <
00116         Sine <
00117         Add< ModuleType0, ModuleType1 >
00118         > ,
00119         Envelope2 <
00120         _clock_select,
00121         _delay,
00122         _attack, _attack_middle, _attack_middle_level,
00123         _hold, _hold_level,
00124         _decay1, _decay1_middle, _decay1_middle_level,
00125         _decay1_end_level,
00126         _decay2, _decay2_middle, _decay2_middle_level,
00127         _sustain_level,
00128         _release, _release_middle, _release_middle_level
00129         >
00130         > OperatorType;
00131         template< typename SampleType >
00132         void operator() ( Buffer< SampleType > &_buffer, CurrentTime &_clock, Note &_note ) {
00133           source_module ( _buffer, _clock, _note );
00134         }
00135       private:
00136         OperatorType source_module;
00137     };
00138   }
00139 }
